Segment.name: ACK
Segment.comment: To acknowledge the ordered quantities and specify the ready date for a specific line item

Field.name: LineItemStatusCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the action taken by the seller on a line item requested by the buyer

Field.name: Quantity
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: RequestReferenceNumber
Field.comment: Reference number or RFQ number to use to identify a particular transaction set and query (additional reference number or description which can be used with contract number)

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId1
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier2
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId2
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier3
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId3
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier4
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId4
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier5
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId5
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier6
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId6
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier7
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId7
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier8
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId8
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier9
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId9
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier10
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId10
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list
